summary: A paleontologist and her husband discover a mother and baby brontosaurus in Africa, and try to protect them from a group of hunters intent on capturing the dinosaurs.
cast: William Katt|Sean Young|Patrick McGoohan|Julian Fellowes|Kyalo Mativo|Hugh Quarshie|Olu Jacobs|Eddie Tagoe|Edward Hardwicke|Julian Curry|Alexis Meless|Susie Nottingham|Stephane Krora|Anthony Sarfoh|Jeannot Banny|Roger Carlton|Thérèse Taba
title: Baby, el secreto de una leyenda perdida
